organic.title: Which Games Are Multiplayer?
organic.snippet: The following games feature simultaneous multiplayer gameplay (requiring two controllers). While in the Game List you can identify them by the orange 2P logo.

organic.title: Suika Game Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack
organic.snippet: Enjoy four game modes: "Original," "Time Limit," "Attack," and "Item." "Original" is the usual Suika Game, and the player with the highest score wins.
